Play a game of Rock Paper Scissors against someone.

## Usage

```sh
/rockpaperscissors
```

## Options

|  Name  |                  Description                  | Required |
| :----: | :-------------------------------------------: | :------: |
| `user` | The user to play Rock Paper Scissors against. |    Yes   |
